com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory

Class AppLocationListRequestFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory.AbstractRequestFactory
      • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory.AbstractPagingRequestFactory
        • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory.AppLocationListRequestFactory

  • @Immutable
@LevelUpApi(contract=PUBLIC)
public final class AppLocationListRequestFactory
extends AbstractPagingRequestFactory
    A list of locations for a specific application ID. This list is paged using the Link header. See LinkHeaderParser.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory.AbstractPagingRequestFactory

      • AppLocationListRequestFactory

                             AbstractPagingRequestFactory.PageCacheRetriever pageCacheRetriever,

                             Location location)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        retriever - the access token retriever.
        pageCacheRetriever - the retriever to use to get the last retrieved page from the cache.
        appId - The target app's web service ID associated with the paging locations request
        location - Optional location to make requests on for paging.

        public AbstractRequest getFirstPageRequest()
        Description copied from class: AbstractPagingRequestFactory

      • getPageRequest

        public AbstractRequest getPageRequest(Uri page)
        Description copied from class: AbstractPagingRequestFactory

        Specified by:
        getPageRequest in class AbstractPagingRequestFactory
        Parameters:
        page - the URL of the next page that should be loaded.
        Returns:
        a request for the next page or null if there is an error.
